com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.util

Class DecimalDigitsInputFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.util.DecimalDigitsInputFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.text.InputFilter

    public class DecimalDigitsInputFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.text.InputFilter
    Input Filter to filter user input decimal values using a pattern. Digits before and after zero can be specified upon constructing the object.
    Author:
    Boyan Stoynov
